snippet: Investigators from the Government Accountability Office said Medicare officials had been slow to recognize and act on the evidence of abuse, which is to be presented at a Senate hearing on Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: Investigators from the Government Accountability Office said Medicare officials had been slow to recognize and act on the evidence of abuse, which is to be presented at a Senate hearing on Tuesday.

headline.main: Report on Medicare Cites Prescription Drug Abuse
headline.print_headline: Report on Medicare Cites Prescription Drug Abuse
headline.seo: Report Warns of Prescription Drug Abuse by Medicare Beneficiaries
